column5: Take a step back in time at the Blanco Haus. Located in the heart of the Blanco Historic Courthouse Square, this 1900â€™s cottage is an ideal location for a vacation destination or your next special event. Painstakingly restored, this cozy cottage takes you back to a bygone era of simple living. The original charm of this historic home has been carefully preserved with just a few modern updates that in no way diminish the quaint ambiance.
